segments.text: I went bungee jumping yesterday . It was so exciting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you really enjoy such dangerous sports ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , They are great fun and very challenging , too . Some day I'll want to try deep-sea diving and rock-climbing , too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are a real fan of extreme sports .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I love facing danger and overcoming it . It has become part of my life .
segments.speaker: S1
